avalancheActivity.highlights: The snow has melted considerably in warm weather and rain earlier this week. Thin layer of new snow on top of old stable snow. Small wet sluffs could release in the new snow.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The snow has melted considerably in warm weather and rain earlier this week. Thin layer of new snow on top of old stable snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: Á sunnudag hlýnar með suðlægum áttum og bætir í vind með deginum. Búast má við skúrum á sunnudagskvöld og fram á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Sluffs fell on Súðavíkuhlíð and Bolungarvík on 4 and 5 February.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New wind slabs have formed in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes. Wet avalanches will become more likely in thaw and rain on Sunday and Monday but should gain strenght after that.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snowfall and snowdrift may have formed new wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. Wet avalanches will become more likely in thaw and rain on Sunday and Monday

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: S-átt og snjókoma til fjalla sunnudagsmorgun en hlýnar svo og rignir í fjallahæð seinnipart sunnudags og mánudag. Hæglætisveður og úrkomulítið á þriðjudag

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow is considered generally stable after wet weather this week. New wind slabs have formed in snowfall and snowdrift especially in N to NE slopes.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snowfall and snowdrift may have formed new wind slabs on top of the stable snow especially in N-NE slopes. Older snow is considered stable and has formed a widespread hard surface where the new snow has not accumulated.

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: Yfir helgina verður áfram kalt í SV-átt með lítilsháttar éljum til fjalla. Á sunnudag hlýnar í SV-átt og hvessir með kvöldinu en ekki er búist við úrkomu með.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Thin layer of moist new snow on top of older snow that is considered mostly stable. Warm weather and thaw this weekend and snow should subside and melt.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A significant amount of snow has melted due to warm temperatures and rain lately. After strong melting the snow pack is expected to be isothermal and stable. A thin layer of new snow came on Friday that is moist.

travelAdvisory.comment: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface
travelAdvisory.highlights: Melt-freeze cycles last week have stabilized the snow but not it is snowing again on top of wet snow which leads to faciting with a weak layer forming at that interface

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjóaði nokkra cm í hægum vindi á föstudag rigndi í kjölfarið á lágelndi. Hæglætis veður og úrkomulítið næstu daga, hlýtt uppí fjallahæð.
